title: Curry and Grill
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Indian, International, Beer/Wine, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Mix of Indian, Mexican and some Spanish dishes. Has a separate Indian vegetarian menu, of which some are vegan or can be made vegan. Several of the Mexican meals have vegetarian dishes listed; please check to see if any are vegan. Indoor seating.
